name: RED SANGRIA
description: Cabernet, Triple Sec, Apricot Brandy, Peach Schnapps, Cinnamon, Lemon, Lime, Orange Originating in Spain, Sangria was traditionally crafted with red wine and fruits to keep water safe to drink centuries ago.

name: WHITE SANGRIA
description: Pinot Grigio, Apricot Brandy, Elderflower Liqueur, Peach Schnapps, Cinnamon, Lime, Orange White sangria became popular in Spain's coastal regions, pairing perfectly with the sunny Mediterranean vibe.

name: TINTO DE VERANO
description: Tres Buhis Tempranillo, Lemon-Lime Soda, Fresh Lime This Spanish favorite translates to "red wine of summer" and is a simple, sparkling way to cool off in Spain's warm climate.

name: KALIMOTXO
description: Tres Buhis Tempranillo, Coca Cola Soda, Fresh Mint & Lemon A Basque Country classic, the Kalimotxo pronounced Cali-Mo-Cho) was accidentally invented at a festival in the 1970s when partygoers blended wine and cola to mask an off-tasting vintage

name: CARAJILLO
description: Licor 43, Espresso, Orange Twist The Carajillo is a Spanish pick-me-up that dates back to Spain's colonial days, where soldiers added coffee to liquor for courage (coraje in Spanish).

name: REBUJITO
description: Fino Sherry, Lemon-Lime Soda, Mint & Lemon. A simple Andalusian cocktail, combining dry sherry with lemon-lime soda. A light, refreshing drink popular at Andalusian festivals, especially the Seville Fair.

name: PAUL CHENEAU BRUT CAVA
description: Catalunya, Spain Crisp with fine bubbles, undertones of flowers and cream pastries amid pleasing fruitfulness, and a lively, clean finish.

name: A20 ALBARINO
description: Rías Baixas, Spain A clean & intensly fresh wine. Ripe and aromatic, with overtones of peach, melon and honey, offset by a crisp tangy acidity.

name: TRES BUHIS TEMPRANILLO
description: Murcia, Spain Intense aromas of cherries and cassis with floral notes. Medium-bodied wine with a soft, pleasant mouthfeel.

name: HONORO VERA, GARNACHA
description: Calatayud, Spain Aromatic intensity dominated by ripe fruit raspberry and currant with elegant mineral and spicy notes.

name: TORRES GRAN CORONAS CABERNET SAUVIGNON RESERVA
description: Penedes, Spain Floral notes alongside cherry pie, blackberry, milk chocolate and anisette flavors wrapped in velvety tannins.

name: FAUSTINO CRIANZA, TEMPRANILLO
description: Rioja, Spain Bold aromas of cherry, raspberry and milk chocolate. A web of plush tannins encases flavors of pomegranate, raspberry, and chocolate-covered caramel.

name: FIDDLEHEAD IPA
description: Fiddlehead 6.2% ABV Well-balanced American IPA with mellow bitterness and a dry, refreshing finish.

name: SHIPPING OUT OF BOSTON
description: Jack's Abby Brewing 5.3% ABV Malty, sweet, and lightly hoppy amber lager that pays homage to the past, while manufacturing a bold future.

name: ALLAGASH WHITE
description: Allagash brewing company 5.2% ABV Brewed with oats, malted wheat, and raw wheat for a hazy "white" appearance. Spiced with our own special blend of coriander and Curaçao orange peel.

name: RICHAR'DZ BREW
description: Built on a backbone of Pilsner Malt, our version of an updated West Coast IPA is pale and bright with intense aromatics and hop flavor with a clean, dry finish with hints of tropical fruit, berries, citrus, floral flavors. Proceeds from each beer sold benefit The Richard Bambara Memorial Fund.

name: CZECH'RD PAST
description: Chatham Brewing 4.5% ABV This classic Bohemian-style pilsner is so crisp and refreshing, it's perfect anytime—and its low ABV makes it an easy drinking favorite.

name: COMMON ROOTS FEATURED
description: Common Roots Featured rotating draft beer from Common Roots Brewing Company located in South Glens Falls, NY.
